___options.description: Options that control the type of signature that will be generated.

___signAs.description: The account that the signature should count for in multisigning.

___keypair.description: The private and public key of the account that is initiating the transaction. (This field cannot be used with secret).

___privateKey.description: The uppercase hexadecimal representation of the secp256k1 or Ed25519 private key.

___publicKey.description: The uppercase hexadecimal representation of the secp256k1 or Ed25519 public key.

___txJSON.description: Transaction represented as a JSON string in rippled format.

___secret.description: The secret of the account that is initiating the transaction. (This field cannot be used with keypair).
